title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' doesn't take effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it doesn't cause the item to be hidden as expected.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label is still visible.
EB: The expected result is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label should disappear.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the PDF preview.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Observe that the label is still visible.
